snippet: Members of the kibbutz, on Israel’s border with Egypt and the Gaza Strip, recalled Sunday’s attack on Egyptian soldiers and why they continue to live near the dangerous border.
abstract: Members of a kibbutz, on Israel’s border with Egypt and the Gaza Strip, recall attack on Egyptian soldiers on Aug 8 and discuss why they continue to live near the dangerous border.

byline.contributor: Carol Sutherland contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Members of the kibbutz, on Israel’s border with Egypt and the Gaza Strip, recalled Sunday’s attack on Egyptian soldiers and why they continue to live near the dangerous border.

headline.seo: Kibbutz Near Gaza Narrowly Misses Sinai Attacks
headline.main: Near Miss for Kibbutz in Path of Sinai Incursion
headline.print_headline: For Residents Of Kibbutz, A Near Miss Is Unsettling
